text: Vladimir Borisovich Korenev (; June 20, 1940 – January 2, 2021) was a Soviet- Russian actor and teacher. He was awarded People's Artist of Russia in 1998. Korenev was born in Sevastopol, Soviet Union. He was known for his roles in Amphibian Man, Children of Don Quixote and Criminal Talent. His career began in 1962. Korenev died of COVID-19 on January 2, 2021 in Moscow, aged 80.Исполнитель главной роли в фильме «Человек-амфибия» умер от COVID-19 ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Russian educators
title: Vladimir Korenev
